input.sentences: we crossed this bridge on our way to the park .
as we made our way through the park | we heard the birds singing .
the we stopped to shop at some stores .

output.sentences: It's a perfect day to take pictures of this beautiful park , staring with this bridge before I cross it.
So many beautiful sights to see like this beautiful monument.
Lets move to this antique side of the park and shop.
Since we have been walking around this park we can rest at this beautiful wooden bench.
After we have rested we should head back but lets take a picture of yet another meaningful monument before we head out.
